events.message: I received my order last week, but unfortunately I no longer want the product and would like to request a refund.
The case has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning refund and return.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle the customer's refund case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your refund request. Iâ€™d be happy to assist you today.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund to help us process it quickly?
My order number is 123456789. I simply changed my mind about the purchase and would like to return the item.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a refund. Please ship the product back to us within 14 days using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the return as soon as possible.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything further we can assist you with.
Your refund case has been closed as resolved. Please contact us again anytime if you need additional support.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on your refund experience.
